Name: Flameon
Typing: Fire

Base Stats:

* HP: 65
* Attack: 130
* Defense: 60
* Special Attack: 95
* Special Defense: 110
* Speed: 65

Abilities:

* Flame Body: The opponent has a 30% chance of being induced with burn when using a physical move to attack the Pokémon.
* Flame Charge: Flameon's speed increases by one stage each time it attacks, and its special attack increases by one stage when it gets hit by a special move.

Pokedex Entry:
Flameon is a quadruped, mammalian Pokémon. It has red fur with a fluffy tuft of fur on its head, as well as a long, fluffy crest on its forehead. Flameon's fluffy fur has a high thermal insulation, so it can survive in extremely cold temperatures.

Moveset:

* Level Up: Ember, Flame Wheel, Flame Charge, Fire Spin, Fire Blast, Sunny Day, Flame Burst
* Egg Moves: Iron Tail, Flame Burst
* TM/HM: Flame Charge, Fire Blast, Flame Wheel, Sunny Day, Will-O-Wisp

Evolutionary Chain:
Eevee -> Flameon (by using Fire Stone)

Name: Dragoneon

Typing: Dragon

Base Stats:

* HP: 65
* Attack: 120
* Defense: 90
* Special Attack: 120
* Special Defense: 90
* Speed: 90

Abilities:

* Dragon's Fury: Dragoneon's moves deal more damage, and its special defense increases by one stage when it gets hit by a special move.
* Dragon's Breath: Dragoneon's special attack increases by one stage each time it attacks, and it has a 30% chance of inducing a burn on the opponent when using a physical move.

Pokedex Entry:
Dragoneon is a quadruped, dragon-like Pokémon. It has purple and blue scales, with a long tail and wing-like fins on its back. Its eyes are a bright, glowing yellow. Its body is surrounded by a powerful aura that is said to have the power to purify the air around it.

Moveset:

* Level Up: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Dance, Dragon Rush, Dragon Claw, Outrage, Draco Meteor, Dragon Tail
* Egg Moves: Dragon Rush, Dragon Pulse
* TM/HM: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Dance, Dragon Rush, Dragon Claw, Outrage, Draco Meteor, Dragon Tail

Evolutionary Chain:
Eevee -> Dragoneon (by using Dragon Stone)

Name: Charjungle

Typing: Fire/Grass

Base Stats:

* HP: 50
* Attack: 85
* Defense: 50
* Special Attack: 85
* Special Defense: 50
* Speed: 70

Abilities:

* Chlorophyll: Charjungle's speed increases when the weather is sunny.
* Flame Body: The opponent has a 30% chance of being induced with burn when using a physical move to attack the Pokémon.

Pokedex Entry:
Charjungle is a regional form of Charmander that is found in dense jungle environments. It has adapted to its surroundings by developing the ability to photosynthesize, giving it a green tint to its scales and allowing it to survive in environments with little sunlight. Despite its new grass typing, it still maintains its fire abilities.

Moveset:

* Level Up: Ember, Vine Whip, Razor Leaf, Flame Wheel, Flame Charge, Solar Beam
* Egg Moves: Dragon Pulse
* TM/HM: Flame Charge, Fire Blast, Flame Wheel, Sunny Day, Will-O-Wisp, Solar Beam

Evolutionary Chain:
Charmander -> Charjungle (by leveling up in a specific jungle area)

Please design a three-stage dragon-type Pokemon line. Please tell me the following information about each of the three dragon-type Pokemon you design:

First Form:
Name: Dratini
Typing: Dragon

Base Stats:

* HP: 41
* Attack: 64
* Defense: 45
* Special Attack: 50
* Special Defense: 50
* Speed: 50

Abilities:

* Shed Skin: Dratini has a 30% chance of healing from any status condition each turn.
* Marvel Scale: Dratini's Defense is increased by 50% when it is inflicted with a status condition.

Pokedex Entry:
Dratini is a serpentine dragon Pokémon that is said to have the power to cleanse polluted waters. Its body is long and slender, with a pure white belly and a blue back. Its eyes are a bright red, and it has two small, white spikes on its forehead.

Moveset:

* Level Up: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Dance, Dragon Rush, Dragon Claw, Outrage, Draco Meteor, Dragon Tail
* Egg Moves: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Rush
* TM/HM: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Dance, Dragon Rush, Dragon Claw, Outrage, Draco Meteor, Dragon Tail

Evolutionary Chain:
Dratini -> Dragonair (level 30) -> Dragonite (level 55)

Second Form:
Name: Dragonair
Typing: Dragon

Base Stats:

* HP: 61
* Attack: 84
* Defense: 65

* Special Defense: 70
* Speed: 70

Abilities:

* Shed Skin: Dragonair has a 30% chance of healing from any status condition each turn.
* Marvel Scale: Dragonair's Defense is increased by 50% when it is inflicted with a status condition.

Pokedex Entry:
Dragonair is a serpentine dragon Pokémon that is said to have the power to cleanse polluted waters. It has a longer body than Dratini, with a pure white belly and a blue back. Its eyes are a bright red, and it has two small, white spikes on its forehead, with a long blue crystal that come out from its forehead.

Moveset:

* Level Up: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Dance, Dragon Rush, Dragon Claw, Outrage, Draco Meteor, Dragon Tail
* Egg Moves: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Rush
* TM/HM: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Dance, Dragon Rush, Dragon Claw, Outrage, Draco Meteor, Dragon Tail

Third Form:
Name: Dragonite
Typing: Dragon/Flying

Base Stats:

* HP: 91
* Attack: 134
* Defense: 95
* Special Attack: 100
* Special Defense: 100
* Speed: 80

Abilities:

* Multiscale: Dragonite's Defense is increased by 50% when at full HP.
* Inner Focus: Dragonite cannot be made flinch.

Pokedex Entry:
Dragonite is the fully evolved form of Dratini, and is said to be incredibly powerful. It has a long, dragon-like body with large wings, allowing it to fly at incredible speeds. Its eyes are a bright red, and it has two small, white spikes on its forehead, with a long blue crystal that come out from its forehead. It has a reputation as a kind-hearted Pokémon, and is often called "The Guardian of the Seas" because it is said to have the power to control the oceans.

Moveset:

* Level Up: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Dance, Dragon Rush, Dragon Claw, Outrage, Draco Meteor, Dragon Tail, Hurricane, Fly
* Egg Moves: Dragon Pulse, Dragon Rush
* TM/HM
